name: I, Robot 2
description:
The Robot War rages on, and so does the war in Del Spooner’s heart. Join Del on a journey of maturation and self-discovery, with some gay robots along the way.

I, Robot 2 does not require any prior knowledge from the 2004 film I, Robot.

Features: 
  • A cavalcade of royalty-free sound effects and music!
  • Sprites for almost every character!
  • An hour of playtime and bot romance!
  • Contains genuine emotion and heartfelt writing!
  • Robots!

Content Warning: Semi-Realistic Portrayal of Divorce, Child Neglect, Death/Violence, Robots Kissing Really Good.
